stripped_text: +3 mu Use the MU on Deep Red only for Caissa programs. Whenever you install a Caissa program, you may trigger its click ability without spending click. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +3[mu] Use the MU on Deep Red only for Caïssa programs. Whenever you install a Caïssa program, you may trigger its [click] ability without spending [click]. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Deep Red
